Release notes for Kendo UI v2015.3.916

Components

What's new

  • WebComponents integration
  • Widget should not resize on window scroll when closing is initiated

What's fixed

  • NOVA theme visual glitches

AngularJS

What's new

  • Automatic delay for angular directive widget initialization if any of the options resolve to undefined

What's fixed

  • DatePicker widget cannot be disabled in IE11
  • Widgets should mute the rebind, when internal option is changed
  • DateTimePicker does not update model in AngularJS application

AutoComplete

What's fixed

  • Selected item is cleared when using sheared DataSource instance

Chart

What's new

  • Exposing custom visuals for pie, donut and funnel segments

What's fixed

  • Bubble items are not properly plotted when there are null items
  • Chart series with particular color names cannot be exported

DataSource

What's fixed

  • Removed and sync-ed data item is restored after calling cancelChanges in offline mode

DatePicker

What's fixed

  • DatePicker widget cannot be disabled in IE11

DateTimePicker

What's fixed

  • DateTimePicker does not update model in AngularJS application
  • Fix DateTimePicker when using ISO date format

Diagram

What's new

  • Add support for custom connection content visual
  • Add support for fromConnector and toConnector binding
  • Improve connections content alignment
  • Trigger dataBound event after shapes and connections are rendered
  • Add layout diagram element
  • Add connections fromConnector and toConnector options

What's fixed

  • Cascading connections routing does not take shape positions into account for long connections
  • Setting editable to true results in an error
  • Calling bringIntoView multiple times without panning or zooming causes issue with the selection

Drawing

What's new

  • Add Rectangle shape

DropDownList

What's fixed

  • ng-model does not work as expected without option label and local data

Editor

What's fixed

  • Inline Editor selection displays white text on white background when using the Material theme
  • Editor tool labels in the overflow dropdown should honor localization messages

Gantt

What's new

  • Add responsive behavior for the gantt widget.
  • Add Task Template functionality for the Gantt widget
  • Add Column Resizing functionality for the Gantt widget.

What's fixed

  • The tooltip of the RTL Gantt is not shown in Chrome
  • 'Add Task' drop-down does not work correctly when gantt's dataSource is set after initialization.

Grid

What's new

  • enable native scrolling for touch devices which support it correctly
  • column reordering should auto-scroll the header/content

What's fixed

  • Error is thrown when k-rebind is used with the grid
  • Rebinding locked columns Grid closes ComboBox popup place outside of the Grid
  • Grid footer has extra padding in exported PDF document when scrolling is enabled
  • NoRecords message not rendered if widget is hidden
  • Grid non-frozen columns' footer cells are clipped during PDF export
  • Multi checkbox filter makes unnecessary read for foreignkey column.
  • Column Menu doesn't highlight the icon if not initialized
  • Grid headerTemplate not compiled when locked columns are used

Map

What's new

  • The zoom method now accepts floating numbers and rounds them to the nearest integer

MaskedTextBox

What's fixed

  • The input caret always remains at initial position on Samsung devices

MobileListView

What's fixed

  • Mobile ListView retains unnecessary scopes on rebind
  • Mobile ListView does not reset its userevents when rebound
  • mobile listview performs unnecessary rendering when MVVM bound and item is changed
  • White text on white background in Android

MobileTabStrip

What's fixed

  • When navigating between different views the current tab is not selected.

MultiSelect

What's fixed

  • Filters are sent wrongly to the server during the first request when minLength and value are applied in the MultiSelect configuration

PDF Export

What's fixed

  • Chart series with particular color names cannot be exported

Pager

What's fixed

  • Pager misaligned in Bootstrap theme when page is collapsed

PivotGrid

What's new

  • Add support for filtration when flat data is used

PopOver

What's fixed

  • popover pane.initial configuration does not work as expected

ProgressBar

What's fixed

  • ProgressBar selection should have all its corners rounded when there is only one chunk
  • Missing borders and wrong gradient directions in ProgressBar

ResponsivePanel

What's fixed

  • Styles break widget in IE9

Scheduler

What's fixed

  • Agenda view does not render correctly continues events which ends on or after the selected period
  • Broken Scheduler with MaterialBlack theme
  • Selected state of the events is not visible in most themes
  • Event start / end time passed to the event template is incorrect when date is not DST

Sortable

What's new

  • Add configuration option that allows placeholder to be moved when cursor enters the target area

TabStrip

What's new

  • enable native scrolling for touch devices which support it correctly

TimePicker

What's new

  • enable native scrolling for touch devices which support it correctly

ToolBar

What's fixed

  • Toggle method does not respect 'false' flag if the target button was not yet checked
  • FireFox: SplitButton focus not applied accordingly
  • Page re-loaded after SplitButton option select

Toolbar

What's fixed

  • Chrome: Focus for SplitButton is not set accordingly

TreeList

What's new

  • Trigger progress handlers on pdfExport promise with reference to the exported page

What's fixed

  • TreeList throws error when configured with k-rebind
  • TreeList filterable option is automatically enabled when culture is not default
  • TreeList drag&drop with autoSync enabled doesn't send corrent parent id field

TreeMap

What's fixed

  • k-rebind does not work for TreeMap widget

TreeView

What's fixed

  • Kendo UI TreeView autoscroll feature does not work
  • JS error when searching DataSource in dataBound handler while fetching child levels
  • Call to setDataSource when there are checked items throws JS error

Upload

What's fixed

  • Disabling the widget does not prevent file droping

Window

What's new

  • Add scrollable option
  • enable native scrolling for touch devices which support it correctly
  • Allow setOptions to change Window modality when the widget is open
